---
title: "Suicides in India"
output: html_notebook
---


### Loading the requried packages

```{r,message=FALSE,error=FALSE}
require(dplyr)
require(tidyr)
require(highcharter)


```



### Let's read the data-

```{r,error=FALSE,message=FALSE}

suicide<-read.csv("Suicides in India 2001-2012.csv")
attach(suicide)

#let's see the various types of suicidal methods
table(Type)

table(Gender)

```

### Let's do some time series analysis of year and total number of cases

```{r,message=F,error=FALSE}

year_df<-suicide %>% select(Year,Total)  %>% 
    group_by(Year) %>% 
    summarise(Total_deaths = n())
```
